info.name: LocalPro Super App API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for LocalPro Super App with all endpoints organized by module. Updated for multi-role support - users can have multiple roles (client, provider, supplier, instructor, agency_owner, agency_admin). Generated automatically from route files.

request.description: Complete onboarding with multi-role support. The `roles` field is optional - if not provided, user keeps existing roles or defaults to ['client']. If provided, must be an array of valid roles. Valid roles: 'client', 'provider', 'admin', 'supplier', 'instructor', 'agency_owner', 'agency_admin'. The 'client' role is always automatically included even if not specified.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "description": "We are looking for an experienced software engineer...",
  "category": "technology",
  "subcategory": "software_development",
  "jobType": "full_time",
  "experienceLevel": "senior",
  "salary": {
    "min": 50000,
    "max": 80000,
    "currency": "PHP",
    "period": "monthly"
  },
  "company": {
    "name": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
    "website": "https://techsolutions.com",
    "location": {
      "address": "789 Business Ave",
      "city": "Makati",
      "state": "Metro Manila",
      "country": "Philippines",
      "isRemote": false
    }
  },
  "requirements": [
    "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science",
    "5+ years of experience",
    "Proficiency in Node.js and React"
  ],
  "benefits": [
    "Health insurance",
    "Remote work options",
    "Flexible hours"
  ],
  "applicationDeadline": "2024-12-31T23:59:59Z"
}

request.description: Request top-up (add money to account). Requires receipt image upload. Admin approval required.
Process top-up request (Admin only). Approve or reject top-up request.
